repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: ILR School Contents of the ILR Classroom Wing Cornerstone
did.abstract: Consists of copies of materials apparently placed in the cornerstone of the Classroom Wing of Ives Hall.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of copies of materials apparently placed in the cornerstone of the Classroom Wing of Ives Hall in the year of its construction. Included are ILR and Cornell materials from the year of the School's founding and the year of the wing's construction.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: ILR School Contents of the ILR Classroom Wing Cornerstone #/4215m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes Cornell Daily Sun from May 16, 1961, and ILR brochures and announcements from 1945-1946 and 1960- 1961.
